医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
从盘子到地球：创新指标追踪饮食对健康和环境的影响饮食如何影响健康和环境。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/From-plate-to-planet-Innovative-indicator-tracks-diet-impact-on-health-and-environment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/From-plate-to-planet-Innovative-indicator-tracks-diet-impact-on-health-and-environment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e2afb92-9e23-40f9-a350-06a67d1bee17 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 04:51:00 -0500 From plate to planet: Innovative indicator tracks diet impact on health and environment
逆转时间：透明质酸注射可持久改善老化皮肤如何通过注射交联透明质酸 (CL-HA) 来逆转有害变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Reversing-time-Hyaluronic-acid-injections-offer- permanent-improvement-in-aging-skin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Reversing-time-Hyaluronic-acid-injections-offer- permanent-improvement-in-aging-skin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2864915-630a-4708-9ed5-65aeb7f319e8 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 04:18:00 -0500 Reversing time: Hyaluronic acid injections offer lasting improvement in aging skin
大型研究发现，健康的生活方式与特定的代谢标志物有关研究人员在一项大型研究中确定了与健康生活方式相关的代谢组标记，显示了脂质代谢与降低死亡风险之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240218/Healthy-lifestyles-linked-to-specific-metabolic-markers-large-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240218/Healthy-lifestyles-linked-to-specific-metabolic-markers-large-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4baf1a06-2876-4eed-bd22-1b6d94a1b6ab Sun, 18 Feb 2024 23:29:00 -0500 Healthy lifestyles linked to specific metabolic markers, large study finds
研究证明蝙蝠物种具有抗癌能力，并查明了关键基因一项研究表明，鼠耳蝠通过基因下调表现出卓越的抗癌能力，为了解天然抗癌机制提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240218/Research-demonstrates-a-bat-species-resistance-to-cancer-pinpoints-key-genes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240218/Research-demonstrates-a-bat-species-resistance-to-cancer-pinpoints-key-genes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ad6c2e2-4a53-4852-b795-da2841a70e08 Sun, 18 Feb 2024 23:13:00 -0500 Research demonstrates a bat species' resistance to cancer, pinpoints key genes
CDC研究发现，美国各州的长期新冠病毒流行率差异很大CDC 的全国性研究显示，美国各地新冠肺炎长期患病率各不相同，从维尔京群岛的 1.9% 到西弗吉尼亚州的 10.6%，这强调了制定有针对性的公共卫生策略的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240218/Long-COVID-prevalence-varies-widely-across-US-states-CDC-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240218/Long-COVID-prevalence-varies-widely-across-US-states-CDC-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00974fa8-ff34-46eb-915c-c5de4f09ce64 Sun, 18 Feb 2024 21:56:00 -0500 Long COVID prevalence varies widely across US states, CDC study finds
研究揭示肯尼亚骆驼中的季节性中东呼吸综合征冠状病毒高峰以及潜在的人类传播研究人员在肯尼亚的单峰骆驼中发现了中东呼吸综合征冠状病毒的双相峰，并有屠宰场工人血清学暴露的证据，凸显了潜在的人类传播风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240218/Study-reveals-seasonal-MERS-CoV-peaks-in-Kenyan-camels-and-潜在-人类-transmission.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240218/Study-reveals-seasonal-MERS-CoV-peaks-in-Kenyan-camels-and-潜在-人类-transmission.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8eadabb6-240d-42f7-ba1c-a4f700e0a80d Sun, 18 Feb 2024 21:40:00 -0500 Study reveals seasonal MERS-CoV peaks in Kenyan camels and potential human transmission
研究揭示了紧急医疗服务绩效的差距，并提出了改进的空间研究评估了美国各地的 EMS 绩效，揭示了护理质量的显着差异，并根据国家数据确定了需要改进的领域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240218/Study-reveals-gaps-in-emergency-medical-services-performance-suggests-room-for-improvement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240218/Study-reveals-gaps-in-emergency-medical-services-performance-suggests-room-for-improvement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74bdf757-3c07-426b-b57b-6dd628d04c0b Sun, 18 Feb 2024 19:51:00 -0500 Study reveals gaps in emergency medical services performance, suggests room for improvement
深度学习为通过眼睛检测帕金森病提供了新的思路研究证明了深度学习算法通过视网膜眼底成像预测帕金森病 (PD) 的潜力，提供了一种非侵入性的早期诊断工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240218/Deep-learning-shines-a-new-light-on-Parkinsons-detection-through-the-eye.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240218/Deep-learning-shines-a-new-light-on-Parkinsons-detection-through-the-eye.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1529b90c-4e26-47a0-8dd7-b5db93c3cc97 Sun, 18 Feb 2024 19:23:00 -0500 Deep learning shines a new light on Parkinson's detection through the eye
废水线索可能彻底改变阿尔茨海默病的检测Review 探讨了基于废水的流行病学 (WBE) 通过生物体液中的生物标志物诊断阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 的潜力，为早期检测和大规模监测提供了一种非侵入性、经济高效的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240218/Wastewater-clues-could-revolutionize-Alzheimers-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240218/Wastewater-clues-could-revolutionize-Alzheimers-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b515de59-ee20-4481-8b29-7b6dba22d79f Sun, 18 Feb 2024 19:15:00 -0500 Wastewater clues could revolutionize Alzheimer's detection
新研究确定了长期新冠肺炎诊断的关键标志物研究确定血清学反应升高和记忆 CD8+ T 细胞克隆扩增是长新冠病毒的关键标志物，为了解其病理学和潜在的诊断方法提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240218/New-study-pinpoints-key-markers-for-Long-COVID-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240218/New-study-pinpoints-key-markers-for-Long-COVID-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4f96884-85fd-4e89-b516-67a67c6bb4e7 Sun, 18 Feb 2024 18:57:00 -0500 New study pinpoints key markers for Long COVID diagnosis
